text: hosphatemic rickets - Hypopigmentation of hair - Hypopigmentation of the skin - Male infertility - Metaphyseal widening - Microscopic hematuria - Myopathy - Nephrolithiasis - Photophobia - Pigmentary retinopathy - Polydipsia - Polyuria - Primary hypothyroidism - Progressive neurologic deterioration - Proteinuria - Rachitic rosary - Recurrent corneal erosions - Reduced visual acuity - Renal Fanconi syndrome - Renal insufficiency - Retinal pigment epithelial mottling - Short stature - Skeletal mus
